string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item:
A yellow sea sponge.
He lives in a pineapple house.
He works as a fry cook at the Krusty Krab restaurant.
A turquoise octopus.\nHe works as a cashier at the Krusty Krab restaurant.\n

A pink starfish.
He is best friends with SpongeBob.
 He lives under a rock.
It is SpongeBob\'s pet sea snail.\n

A squirrel from Texas.
She lives in an air-filled glass dome.
She works as a scientist.

string-array.name: long_descriptions
string-array.item:
SpongeBob is a good-natured, naive sea sponge.

He lives in the undersea city of Bikini Bottom in a pineapple house.

He works as a fry cook at the Krusty Krab restaurant.

SpongeBob's hobbies include fishing for jellyfish, practicing karate and blowing bubbles.

Squidward is a grumpy and bitter turquoise octopus.

He lives in the city of Bikini Bottom in a moai situated between SpongeBob' pineapple house and Patrick Star's rock.

He believes himself to be a talented artist and musician.

He plays the clarinet and paints self-portraits.

Patrick Star is A pink starfish who lives under a rock and wears flowered swim trunks.

He is SpongeBob's best friend.

He is with extremely low intelligence.

He is generally slow and even-tempered but can sometimes get aggressive, much like real starfish.

Gary the Snail is SpongeBob's pet sea snail.

 It lives with SpongeBob and vocalizes like a cat.

Gary often serves as a voice of reason to SpongeBob and solves problems that his owner cannot.

He has a pink shell that is impossibly spacious on the inside.

Sandy Cheeks is a squirrel from Texas.

She lives in an air-filled glass dome and wears a diving suit to breathe underwater.

Sandy works as a scientist, and inventor.

She is a rodeo champion with a number of athletic interests, such as "sand-boarding" and karate.
